2832.name: BANNED_DEVICE_ALL_TEMPORARILY
2832.short_description: Your console is temporarily banned from all aspects of the network
2832.long_description:
Your console has been temporarily banned from all aspects of the network. This includes, but is not limited to:

- Miiverse
- Game servers
- 3rd party services which opt-in to respecting network bans.
2832.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire and don't do whatever you did to get banned
2832.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire and don't do whatever you did to get banned
